Body:
data = nk.data('bio_resting_8min_100hz')
df, info = nk.eda_process(data['EDA'], sampling_rate=100)
columns = ['SCR_Peaks_N', 'SCR_Peaks_Amplitude_Mean']
features_df = nk.eda_intervalrelated(df)
assert all(elem in columns for elem in np.array(features_df.columns.values,
    dtype=str))
assert features_df.shape[0] == 1
epochs = nk.epochs_create(df, events=[0, 25300], sampling_rate=100,
    epochs_end=20)
features_dict = nk.eda_intervalrelated(epochs)
assert all(elem in columns for elem in np.array(features_dict.columns.
    values, dtype=str))
assert features_dict.shape[0] == 2
